summary: Removed content div (title, description, buttons) from banner section as user deleted it. Increased image quality by adding image-rendering properties (crisp-edges, high-quality, -webkit-optimize-contrast), fetchpriority='high', and loading='eager'. Doubled container height from 252px to 504px. Banner now displays only the background image with higher quality and double height.
current_status: Banner section now shows only background image with improved quality settings and doubled height (504px). Content div removed. Image rendering optimized for crisp, high-quality display.
